00029 #include <linux/module.h>

00038 #define HASH_NODEMAP_BKT_BITS 3
00039 #define HASH_NODEMAP_CUR_BITS 3
00040 #define HASH_NODEMAP_MAX_BITS 7
00041 
00042 #define DEFAULT_NODEMAP "default"
00043 
00044 /* nodemap proc root proc directory under fs/lustre */
00045 struct proc_dir_entry *proc_lustre_nodemap_root;
00046 
00047 /* Copy of config active flag to avoid locking in mapping functions */
00048 bool nodemap_active;
00049 
00050 /* Lock protecting the active config, useful primarily when proc and
00051  * nodemap_hash might be replaced when loading a new config
00052  * Any time the active config is referenced, the lock should be held.
00053  */
00054 DEFINE_MUTEX(active_config_lock);
00055 struct nodemap_config *active_config;
00056 
00062 static void nodemap_destroy(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00063 {
00064         ENTRY;
00065 
00066         if (nodemap->nm_pde_data != NULL)
00067                 lprocfs_nodemap_remove(nodemap->nm_pde_data);
00068 
00069         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00070         down_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00071         nm_member_reclassify_nodemap(nodemap);
00072         up_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00073         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00074 
00075         if (!list_empty(&nodemap->nm_member_list))
00076                 CWARN("nodemap_destroy failed to reclassify all members\n");
00077 
00078         write_lock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00079         idmap_delete_tree(nodemap);
00080         write_unlock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00081 
00082         nm_member_delete_list(nodemap);
00083 
00084         OBD_FREE_PTR(nodemap);
00085 
00086         EXIT;
00087 }
00088 
00092 static void nodemap_getref(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00093 {
00094         atomic_inc(&nodemap->nm_refcount);
00095 }
00096 
00101 void nodemap_putref(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00102 {
00103         LASSERT(nodemap != NULL);
00104         LASSERT(atomic_read(&nodemap->nm_refcount) > 0);
00105 
00106         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&nodemap->nm_refcount))
00107                 nodemap_destroy(nodemap);
00108 }
00109 
00110 static __u32 nodemap_hashfn(struct cfs_hash *hash_body,
00111                             const void *key, unsigned mask)
00112 {
00113         return cfs_hash_djb2_hash(key, strlen(key), mask);
00114 }
00115 
00116 static void *nodemap_hs_key(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00117 {
00118         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
00119 
00120         nodemap = hlist_entry(hnode, struct lu_nodemap, nm_hash);
00121 
00122         return nodemap->nm_name;
00123 }
00124 
00125 static int nodemap_hs_keycmp(const void *key,
00126                              struct hlist_node *compared_hnode)
00127 {
00128         char *nodemap_name;
00129 
00130         nodemap_name = nodemap_hs_key(compared_hnode);
00131 
00132         return !strcmp(key, nodemap_name);
00133 }
00134 
00135 static void *nodemap_hs_hashobject(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00136 {
00137         return hlist_entry(hnode, struct lu_nodemap, nm_hash);
00138 }
00139 
00140 static void nodemap_hs_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00141 {
00142         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
00143 
00144         nodemap = hlist_entry(hnode, struct lu_nodemap, nm_hash);
00145         nodemap_getref(nodemap);
00146 }
00147 
00148 static void nodemap_hs_put_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs,
00149                                   struct hlist_node *hnode)
00150 {
00151         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
00152 
00153         nodemap = hlist_entry(hnode, struct lu_nodemap, nm_hash);
00154         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00155 }
00156 
00157 static struct cfs_hash_ops nodemap_hash_operations = {
00158         .hs_hash        = nodemap_hashfn,
00159         .hs_key         = nodemap_hs_key,
00160         .hs_keycmp      = nodemap_hs_keycmp,
00161         .hs_object      = nodemap_hs_hashobject,
00162         .hs_get         = nodemap_hs_get,
00163         .hs_put_locked  = nodemap_hs_put_locked,
00164 };
00165 
00166 /* end of cfs_hash functions */
00167 
00174 static int nodemap_init_hash(struct nodemap_config *nmc)
00175 {
00176         nmc->nmc_nodemap_hash = cfs_hash_create("NODEMAP",
00177                                                 HASH_NODEMAP_CUR_BITS,
00178                                                 HASH_NODEMAP_MAX_BITS,
00179                                                 HASH_NODEMAP_BKT_BITS, 0,
00180                                                 CFS_HASH_MIN_THETA,
00181                                                 CFS_HASH_MAX_THETA,
00182                                                 &nodemap_hash_operations,
00183                                                 CFS_HASH_DEFAULT);
00184 
00185         if (nmc->nmc_nodemap_hash == NULL) {
00186                 CERROR("cannot create nodemap_hash table\n");
00187                 return -ENOMEM;
00188         }
00189 
00190         return 0;
00191 }
00192 
00200 static bool nodemap_name_is_valid(const char *name)
00201 {
00202         if (strlen(name) > LUSTRE_NODEMAP_NAME_LENGTH ||
00203             strlen(name) == 0)
00204                 return false;
00205 
00206         for (; *name != '\0'; name++) {
00207                 if (!isalnum(*name) && *name != '_')
00208                         return false;
00209         }
00210 
00211         return true;
00212 }
00213 
00225 struct lu_nodemap *nodemap_lookup(const char *name)
00226 {
00227         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap = NULL;
00228 
00229         if (!nodemap_name_is_valid(name))
00230                 return ERR_PTR(-EINVAL);
00231 
00232         nodemap = cfs_hash_lookup(active_config->nmc_nodemap_hash, name);
00233         if (nodemap == NULL)
00234                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
00235 
00236         return nodemap;
00237 }
00238 
00247 struct lu_nodemap *nodemap_classify_nid(lnet_nid_t nid)
00248 {
00249         struct lu_nid_range     *range;
00250         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
00251 
00252         range = range_search(&active_config->nmc_range_tree, nid);
00253         if (range != NULL)
00254                 nodemap = range->rn_nodemap;
00255         else
00256                 nodemap = active_config->nmc_default_nodemap;
00257 
00258         nodemap_getref(nodemap);
00259 
00260         return nodemap;
00261 }
00262 
00266 static bool is_default_nodemap(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00267 {
00268         return nodemap->nm_id == 0;
00269 }
00270 
00278 int nodemap_parse_range(const char *range_str, lnet_nid_t range[2])
00279 {
00280         char    buf[LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE * 2 + 2];
00281         char    *ptr = NULL;
00282         char    *start_nidstr;
00283         char    *end_nidstr;
00284         int     rc = 0;
00285 
00286         snprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), "%s", range_str);
00287         ptr = buf;
00288         start_nidstr = strsep(&ptr, ":");
00289         end_nidstr = strsep(&ptr, ":");
00290 
00291         if (start_nidstr == NULL || end_nidstr == NULL)
00292                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00293 
00294         range[0] = libcfs_str2nid(start_nidstr);
00295         range[1] = libcfs_str2nid(end_nidstr);
00296 
00297 out:
00298         return rc;
00299 
00300 }
00301 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_parse_range);
00302 
00313 int nodemap_parse_idmap(char *idmap_str, __u32 idmap[2])
00314 {
00315         char                    *sep;
00316         long unsigned int        idmap_buf;
00317         int                      rc;
00318 
00319         if (idmap_str == NULL)
00320                 return -EINVAL;
00321 
00322         sep = strchr(idmap_str, ':');
00323         if (sep == NULL)
00324                 return -EINVAL;
00325         *sep = '\0';
00326         sep++;
00327 
00328         rc = kstrtoul(idmap_str, 10, &idmap_buf);
00329         if (rc != 0)
00330                 return -EINVAL;
00331         idmap[0] = idmap_buf;
00332 
00333         rc = kstrtoul(sep, 10, &idmap_buf);
00334         if (rc != 0)
00335                 return -EINVAL;
00336         idmap[1] = idmap_buf;
00337 
00338         return 0;
00339 }
00340 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_parse_idmap);
00341 
00351 int nodemap_add_member(lnet_nid_t nid, struct obd_export *exp)
00352 {
00353         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
00354         int rc;
00355 
00356         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00357         down_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00358 
00359         nodemap = nodemap_classify_nid(nid);
00360         rc = nm_member_add(nodemap, exp);
00361 
00362         up_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00363         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00364 
00365         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00366 
00367         return rc;
00368 }
00369 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_add_member);
00370 
00376 void nodemap_del_member(struct obd_export *exp)
00377 {
00378         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00379 
00380         if (nodemap != NULL)
00381                 nm_member_del(nodemap, exp);
00382 }
00383 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_del_member);
00384 
00396 int nodemap_add_idmap_helper(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap,
00397                              enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00398                              const __u32 map[2])
00399 {
00400         struct lu_idmap         *idmap;
00401         int                     rc = 0;
00402 
00403         idmap = idmap_create(map[0], map[1]);
00404         if (idmap == NULL)
00405                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00406 
00407         write_lock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00408         idmap_insert(id_type, idmap, nodemap);
00409         write_unlock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00410         nm_member_revoke_locks(nodemap);
00411 
00412 out:
00413         return rc;
00414 }
00415 
00416 int nodemap_add_idmap(const char *name, enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00417                       const __u32 map[2])
00418 {
00419         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = NULL;
00420         int                      rc;
00421 
00422         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00423         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(name);
00424         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
00425                 mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00426                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap));
00427         }
00428 
00429         if (is_default_nodemap(nodemap)) {
00430                 rc = -EINVAL;
00431         } else {
00432                 rc = nodemap_add_idmap_helper(nodemap, id_type, map);
00433                 if (rc == 0)
00434                         rc = nodemap_idx_idmap_add(nodemap, id_type, map);
00435         }
00436         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00437         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00438 
00439 out:
00440         return rc;
00441 }
00442 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_add_idmap);
00443 
00455 int nodemap_del_idmap(const char *name, enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00456                       const __u32 map[2])
00457 {
00458         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = NULL;
00459         struct lu_idmap         *idmap = NULL;
00460         int                     rc = 0;
00461 
00462         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00463         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(name);
00464         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
00465                 mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00466                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap));
00467         }
00468 
00469         if (is_default_nodemap(nodemap))
00470                 GOTO(out_putref, rc = -EINVAL);
00471 
00472         write_lock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00473         idmap = idmap_search(nodemap, NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS, id_type,
00474                              map[0]);
00475         if (idmap == NULL) {
00476                 rc = -EINVAL;
00477         } else {
00478                 idmap_delete(id_type, idmap, nodemap);
00479                 rc = nodemap_idx_idmap_del(nodemap, id_type, map);
00480         }
00481         write_unlock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00482 
00483 out_putref:
00484         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00485         if (rc == 0)
00486                 nm_member_revoke_locks(nodemap);
00487         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00488 
00489 out:
00490         return rc;
00491 }
00492 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_del_idmap);
00493 
00519 __u32 nodemap_map_id(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap,
00520                      enum nodemap_id_type id_type,
00521                      enum nodemap_tree_type tree_type, __u32 id)
00522 {
00523         struct lu_idmap         *idmap = NULL;
00524         __u32                    found_id;
00525 
00526         if (!nodemap_active)
00527                 goto out;
00528 
00529         if (unlikely(nodemap == NULL))
00530                 goto out;
00531 
00532         if (id == 0) {
00533                 if (nodemap->nmf_allow_root_access)
00534                         goto out;
00535                 else
00536                         goto squash;
00537         }
00538 
00539         if (nodemap->nmf_trust_client_ids)
00540                 goto out;
00541 
00542         if (is_default_nodemap(nodemap))
00543                 goto squash;
00544 
00545         read_lock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00546         idmap = idmap_search(nodemap, tree_type, id_type, id);
00547         if (idmap == NULL) {
00548                 read_unlock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00549                 goto squash;
00550         }
00551 
00552         if (tree_type == NODEMAP_FS_TO_CLIENT)
00553                 found_id = idmap->id_client;
00554         else
00555                 found_id = idmap->id_fs;
00556         read_unlock(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00557         return found_id;
00558 
00559 squash:
00560         if (id_type == NODEMAP_UID)
00561                 return nodemap->nm_squash_uid;
00562         else
00563                 return nodemap->nm_squash_gid;
00564 out:
00565         return id;
00566 }
00567 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_map_id);
00568 
00580 ssize_t nodemap_map_acl(struct lu_nodemap *nodemap, void *buf, size_t size,
00581                         enum nodemap_tree_type tree_type)
00582 {
00583         posix_acl_xattr_header  *header = buf;
00584         posix_acl_xattr_entry   *entry = &header->a_entries[0];
00585         posix_acl_xattr_entry   *new_entry = entry;
00586         posix_acl_xattr_entry   *end;
00587         int                      count;
00588 
00589         if (!nodemap_active)
00590                 return size;
00591 
00592         if (unlikely(nodemap == NULL))
00593                 return size;
00594 
00595         count = posix_acl_xattr_count(size);
00596         if (count < 0)
00597                 return -EINVAL;
00598         if (count == 0)
00599                 return 0;
00600 
00601         for (end = entry + count; entry != end; entry++) {
00602                 __u16 tag = le16_to_cpu(entry->e_tag);
00603                 __u32 id = le32_to_cpu(entry->e_id);
00604 
00605                 switch (tag) {
00606                 case ACL_USER:
00607                         id = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_UID,
00608                                             tree_type, id);
00609                         if (id == nodemap->nm_squash_uid)
00610                                 continue;
00611                         entry->e_id = cpu_to_le32(id);
00612                         break;
00613                 case ACL_GROUP:
00614                         id = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, NODEMAP_GID,
00615                                             tree_type, id);
00616                         if (id == nodemap->nm_squash_gid)
00617                                 continue;
00618                         entry->e_id = cpu_to_le32(id);
00619                         break;
00620                 }
00621 
00622                 /* if we skip an ACL, copy the following ones over it */
00623                 if (new_entry != entry)
00624                         *new_entry = *entry;
00625 
00626                 new_entry++;
00627         }
00628 
00629         return (void *)new_entry - (void *)header;
00630 }
00631 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_map_acl);
00632 
00633 /*
00634  * Add nid range to given nodemap
00635  *
00636  * \param       config          nodemap config to work on
00637  * \param       nodemap         nodemap to add range to
00638  * \param       nid             nid range to add
00639  * \param       range_id        should be 0 unless loading from disk
00640  * \retval      0               success
00641  * \retval      -ENOMEM
00642  *
00643  */
00644 int nodemap_add_range_helper(struct nodemap_config *config,
00645                              struct lu_nodemap *nodemap,
00646                              const lnet_nid_t nid[2],
00647                              unsigned int range_id)
00648 {
00649         struct lu_nid_range     *range;
00650         int rc;
00651 
00652         down_write(&config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00653         range = range_create(&config->nmc_range_tree, nid[0], nid[1],
00654                              nodemap, range_id);
00655         if (range == NULL) {
00656                 up_write(&config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00657                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00658         }
00659 
00660         rc = range_insert(&config->nmc_range_tree, range);
00661         if (rc != 0) {
00662                 CERROR("cannot insert nodemap range into '%s': rc = %d\n",
00663                       nodemap->nm_name, rc);
00664                 up_write(&config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00665                 list_del(&range->rn_list);
00666                 range_destroy(range);
00667                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00668         }
00669 
00670         list_add(&range->rn_list, &nodemap->nm_ranges);
00671         nm_member_reclassify_nodemap(config->nmc_default_nodemap);
00672         up_write(&config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00673 
00674         /* if range_id is non-zero, we are loading from disk */
00675         if (range_id == 0)
00676                 rc = nodemap_idx_range_add(range, nid);
00677 
00678         nm_member_revoke_locks(config->nmc_default_nodemap);
00679         nm_member_revoke_locks(nodemap);
00680 
00681 out:
00682         return rc;
00683 }
00684 int nodemap_add_range(const char *name, const lnet_nid_t nid[2])
00685 {
00686         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = NULL;
00687         int                      rc;
00688 
00689         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00690         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(name);
00691         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
00692                 mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00693                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap));
00694         }
00695 
00696         if (is_default_nodemap(nodemap))
00697                 rc = -EINVAL;
00698         else
00699                 rc = nodemap_add_range_helper(active_config, nodemap, nid, 0);
00700         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00701         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00702 out:
00703         return rc;
00704 }
00705 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_add_range);
00706 
00716 int nodemap_del_range(const char *name, const lnet_nid_t nid[2])
00717 {
00718         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
00719         struct lu_nid_range     *range;
00720         int                     rc = 0;
00721 
00722         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00723         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(name);
00724         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
00725                 mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00726                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap));
00727         }
00728 
00729         if (is_default_nodemap(nodemap))
00730                 GOTO(out_putref, rc = -EINVAL);
00731 
00732         down_write(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00733         range = range_find(&active_config->nmc_range_tree, nid[0], nid[1]);
00734         if (range == NULL) {
00735                 up_write(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00736                 GOTO(out_putref, rc = -EINVAL);
00737         }
00738         rc = nodemap_idx_range_del(range);
00739         range_delete(&active_config->nmc_range_tree, range);
00740         nm_member_reclassify_nodemap(nodemap);
00741         up_write(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
00742 
00743         nm_member_revoke_locks(active_config->nmc_default_nodemap);
00744         nm_member_revoke_locks(nodemap);
00745 
00746 out_putref:
00747         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00748         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00749 out:
00750         return rc;
00751 }
00752 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_del_range);
00753 
00772 struct lu_nodemap *nodemap_create(const char *name,
00773                                   struct nodemap_config *config,
00774                                   bool is_default)
00775 {
00776         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = NULL;
00777         struct lu_nodemap       *default_nodemap;
00778         struct cfs_hash         *hash = config->nmc_nodemap_hash;
00779         int                      rc = 0;
00780 
00781         default_nodemap = config->nmc_default_nodemap;
00782 
00783         if (!nodemap_name_is_valid(name))
00784                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00785 
00786         if (hash == NULL) {
00787                 CERROR("Config nodemap hash is NULL, unable to add %s\n", name);
00788                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00789         }
00790 
00791         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(nodemap);
00792         if (nodemap == NULL) {
00793                 CERROR("cannot allocate memory (%zu bytes)"
00794                        "for nodemap '%s'\n", sizeof(*nodemap),
00795                        name);
00796                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00797         }
00798 
00799         /*
00800          * take an extra reference to prevent nodemap from being destroyed
00801          * while it's being created.
00802          */
00803         atomic_set(&nodemap->nm_refcount, 2);
00804         snprintf(nodemap->nm_name, sizeof(nodemap->nm_name), "%s", name);
00805         rc = cfs_hash_add_unique(hash, name, &nodemap->nm_hash);
00806         if (rc != 0) {
00807                 OBD_FREE_PTR(nodemap);
00808                 GOTO(out, rc = -EEXIST);
00809         }
00810 
00811         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nodemap->nm_ranges);
00812         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nodemap->nm_list);
00813         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nodemap->nm_member_list);
00814 
00815         mutex_init(&nodemap->nm_member_list_lock);
00816         rwlock_init(&nodemap->nm_idmap_lock);
00817         nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_uidmap = RB_ROOT;
00818         nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_uidmap = RB_ROOT;
00819         nodemap->nm_fs_to_client_gidmap = RB_ROOT;
00820         nodemap->nm_client_to_fs_gidmap = RB_ROOT;
00821 
00822         if (is_default) {
00823                 nodemap->nm_id = LUSTRE_NODEMAP_DEFAULT_ID;
00824                 config->nmc_default_nodemap = nodemap;
00825         } else {
00826                 config->nmc_nodemap_highest_id++;
00827                 nodemap->nm_id = config->nmc_nodemap_highest_id;
00828         }
00829 
00830         if (is_default || default_nodemap == NULL) {
00831                 nodemap->nmf_trust_client_ids = 0;
00832                 nodemap->nmf_allow_root_access = 0;
00833 
00834                 nodemap->nm_squash_uid = NODEMAP_NOBODY_UID;
00835                 nodemap->nm_squash_gid = NODEMAP_NOBODY_GID;
00836                 if (!is_default)
00837                         CWARN("adding nodemap '%s' to config without"
00838                               " default nodemap\n", nodemap->nm_name);
00839         } else {
00840                 nodemap->nmf_trust_client_ids =
00841                                 default_nodemap->nmf_trust_client_ids;
00842                 nodemap->nmf_allow_root_access =
00843                                 default_nodemap->nmf_allow_root_access;
00844 
00845                 nodemap->nm_squash_uid = default_nodemap->nm_squash_uid;
00846                 nodemap->nm_squash_gid = default_nodemap->nm_squash_gid;
00847         }
00848 
00849         return nodemap;
00850 
00851 out:
00852         CERROR("cannot add nodemap: '%s': rc = %d\n", name, rc);
00853         return ERR_PTR(rc);
00854 }
00855 
00864 int nodemap_set_allow_root(const char *name, bool allow_root)
00865 {
00866         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = NULL;
00867         int                     rc = 0;
00868 
00869         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
00870         nodemap = nodemap_lookup(name);
00871         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
00872         if (IS_ERR(nodemap))
00873                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap));
00874 
00875         nodemap->nmf_allow_root_access = allow_root;
00876         rc = nodemap_idx_nodemap_update(nodemap);
00877 
00878         nm_member_revoke_locks(nodemap);
00879         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
00880 out:
00881         return rc;
00882 }
00883 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_set_allow_root);
00884

00907

00909         nodemap_putref(nodemap);

00987 bool nodemap_can_setquota(const struct lu_nodemap *nodemap)
00988 {
00989         return !nodemap_active || nodemap->nmf_allow_root_access;
00990 }
00991 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_can_setquota);
00992 
01002 int nodemap_add(const char *nodemap_name)
01003 {
01004         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
01005         int rc;
01006 
01007         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
01008         nodemap = nodemap_create(nodemap_name, active_config, 0);
01009         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
01010                 mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01011                 return PTR_ERR(nodemap);
01012         }
01013 
01014         rc = nodemap_idx_nodemap_add(nodemap);
01015         if (rc == 0)
01016                 rc = lprocfs_nodemap_register(nodemap, 0);
01017 
01018         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01019         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
01020 
01021         return rc;
01022 }
01023 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_add);
01024 
01033 int nodemap_del(const char *nodemap_name)
01034 {
01035         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
01036         struct lu_nid_range     *range;
01037         struct lu_nid_range     *range_temp;
01038         int                      rc = 0;
01039         int                      rc2 = 0;
01040 
01041         if (strcmp(nodemap_name, DEFAULT_NODEMAP) == 0)
01042                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01043 
01044         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
01045         nodemap = cfs_hash_del_key(active_config->nmc_nodemap_hash,
01046                                    nodemap_name);
01047         if (nodemap == NULL) {
01048                 mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01049                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
01050         }
01051 
01052         /* erase nodemap from active ranges to prevent client assignment */
01053         down_write(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01054         list_for_each_entry_safe(range, range_temp, &nodemap->nm_ranges,
01055                                  rn_list) {
01056                 rc2 = nodemap_idx_range_del(range);
01057                 if (rc2 < 0)
01058                         rc = rc2;
01059 
01060                 range_delete(&active_config->nmc_range_tree, range);
01061         }
01062         up_write(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01063 
01064         rc2 = nodemap_idx_nodemap_del(nodemap);
01065         if (rc2 < 0)
01066                 rc = rc2;
01067 
01068         /*
01069          * remove procfs here in case nodemap_create called with same name
01070          * before nodemap_destroy is run.
01071          */
01072         lprocfs_nodemap_remove(nodemap->nm_pde_data);
01073         nodemap->nm_pde_data = NULL;
01074         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01075 
01076         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
01077 
01078 out:
01079         return rc;
01080 }
01081 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_del);
01082 
01088 void nodemap_activate(const bool value)
01089 {
01090         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
01091         active_config->nmc_nodemap_is_active = value;
01092 
01093         /* copy active value to global to avoid locking in map functions */
01094         nodemap_active = value;
01095         nodemap_idx_nodemap_activate(value);
01096         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01097         nm_member_revoke_all();
01098 }
01099 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_activate);
01100 
01109 static int nodemap_cleanup_iter_cb(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
01110                                    struct hlist_node *hnode,
01111                                    void *nodemap_list_head)
01112 {
01113         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
01114 
01115         nodemap = hlist_entry(hnode, struct lu_nodemap, nm_hash);
01116         list_add(&nodemap->nm_list, nodemap_list_head);
01117 
01118         cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(hs, bd, hnode);
01119 
01120         return 0;
01121 }
01122 
01126 void nodemap_config_cleanup(struct nodemap_config *config)
01127 {
01128         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap = NULL;
01129         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap_temp;
01130         struct lu_nid_range     *range;
01131         struct lu_nid_range     *range_temp;
01132         LIST_HEAD(nodemap_list_head);
01133 
01134         cfs_hash_for_each_safe(config->nmc_nodemap_hash,
01135                                nodemap_cleanup_iter_cb, &nodemap_list_head);
01136         cfs_hash_putref(config->nmc_nodemap_hash);
01137 
01138         /* Because nodemap_destroy might sleep, we can't destroy them
01139          * in cfs_hash_for_each, so we build a list there and destroy here
01140          */
01141         list_for_each_entry_safe(nodemap, nodemap_temp, &nodemap_list_head,
01142                                  nm_list) {
01143                 down_write(&config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01144                 list_for_each_entry_safe(range, range_temp, &nodemap->nm_ranges,
01145                                          rn_list)
01146                         range_delete(&config->nmc_range_tree, range);
01147                 up_write(&config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01148 
01149                 nodemap_putref(nodemap);
01150         }
01151 }
01152 
01153 struct nodemap_config *nodemap_config_alloc(void)
01154 {
01155         struct nodemap_config *config;
01156         int rc = 0;
01157 
01158         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(config);
01159         if (config == NULL)
01160                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
01161 
01162         rc = nodemap_init_hash(config);
01163         if (rc != 0) {
01164                 OBD_FREE_PTR(config);
01165                 return ERR_PTR(rc);
01166         }
01167 
01168         init_rwsem(&config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01169 
01170         return config;
01171 }
01172 
01173 void nodemap_config_dealloc(struct nodemap_config *config)
01174 {
01175         nodemap_config_cleanup(config);
01176         OBD_FREE_PTR(config);
01177 }
01178 
01179 static int nm_hash_list_cb(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
01180                            struct hlist_node *hnode,
01181                            void *nodemap_list_head)
01182 {
01183         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
01184 
01185         nodemap = hlist_entry(hnode, struct lu_nodemap, nm_hash);
01186         list_add(&nodemap->nm_list, nodemap_list_head);
01187         return 0;
01188 }
01189 
01190 void nodemap_config_set_active(struct nodemap_config *config)
01191 {
01192         struct nodemap_config   *old_config = active_config;
01193         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
01194         struct lu_nodemap       *tmp;
01195         LIST_HEAD(nodemap_list_head);
01196 
01197         ENTRY;
01198 
01199         LASSERT(active_config != config);
01200 
01201         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
01202 
01203         /* move proc entries from already existing nms, create for new nms */
01204         cfs_hash_for_each_safe(config->nmc_nodemap_hash,
01205                                nm_hash_list_cb, &nodemap_list_head);
01206         list_for_each_entry_safe(nodemap, tmp, &nodemap_list_head, nm_list) {
01207                 struct lu_nodemap *old_nm = NULL;
01208 
01209                 if (active_config != NULL)
01210                         old_nm = cfs_hash_lookup(
01211                                         active_config->nmc_nodemap_hash,
01212                                         nodemap->nm_name);
01213                 if (old_nm != NULL) {
01214                         nodemap->nm_pde_data = old_nm->nm_pde_data;
01215                         old_nm->nm_pde_data = NULL;
01216                         nodemap_putref(old_nm);
01217                 } else {
01218                         bool is_def = (nodemap == config->nmc_default_nodemap);
01219 
01220                         lprocfs_nodemap_register(nodemap, is_def);
01221                 }
01222         }
01223 
01224         /* if new config is inactive, deactivate live config before switching */
01225         if (!config->nmc_nodemap_is_active)
01226                 nodemap_active = false;
01227         active_config = config;
01228         if (config->nmc_nodemap_is_active)
01229                 nodemap_active = true;
01230 
01231         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01232 
01233         if (old_config != NULL)
01234                 nodemap_config_dealloc(old_config);
01235 
01236         nm_member_revoke_all();
01237 
01238         EXIT;
01239 }
01240 
01244 void nodemap_mod_exit(void)
01245 {
01246         nodemap_config_dealloc(active_config);
01247         nodemap_procfs_exit();
01248 }
01249 
01253 int nodemap_mod_init(void)
01254 {
01255         struct nodemap_config   *new_config;
01256         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
01257         int                      rc = 0;
01258 
01259         rc = nodemap_procfs_init();
01260         if (rc != 0)
01261                 return rc;
01262 
01263         new_config = nodemap_config_alloc();
01264         if (IS_ERR(new_config)) {
01265                 nodemap_procfs_exit();
01266                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(new_config));
01267         }
01268 
01269         nodemap = nodemap_create(DEFAULT_NODEMAP, new_config, 1);
01270         if (IS_ERR(nodemap)) {
01271                 nodemap_config_dealloc(new_config);
01272                 nodemap_procfs_exit();
01273                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(nodemap));
01274         }
01275 
01276         nodemap_config_set_active(new_config);
01277         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
01278 
01279 out:
01280         return rc;
01281 }
01282 
01286 void nm_member_revoke_all(void)
01287 {
01288         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap;
01289         struct lu_nodemap *tmp;
01290         LIST_HEAD(nodemap_list_head);
01291 
01292         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
01293         cfs_hash_for_each_safe(active_config->nmc_nodemap_hash,
01294                                nm_hash_list_cb, &nodemap_list_head);
01295 
01296         /* revoke_locks sleeps, so can't call in cfs hash cb */
01297         list_for_each_entry_safe(nodemap, tmp, &nodemap_list_head, nm_list)
01298                 nm_member_revoke_locks(nodemap);
01299         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01300 }
01301 
01311 void nodemap_test_nid(lnet_nid_t nid, char *name_buf, size_t name_len)
01312 {
01313         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
01314 
01315         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
01316         down_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01317         nodemap = nodemap_classify_nid(nid);
01318         up_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01319         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01320 
01321         strncpy(name_buf, nodemap->nm_name, name_len);
01322         if (name_len > 0)
01323                 name_buf[name_len - 1] = '\0';
01324 
01325         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
01326 }
01327 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_test_nid);
01328 
01339 __u32 nodemap_test_id(lnet_nid_t nid, enum nodemap_id_type idtype,
01340                       __u32 client_id)
01341 {
01342         struct lu_nodemap       *nodemap;
01343         __u32                    fs_id;
01344 
01345         mutex_lock(&active_config_lock);
01346         down_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01347         nodemap = nodemap_classify_nid(nid);
01348         up_read(&active_config->nmc_range_tree_lock);
01349         mutex_unlock(&active_config_lock);
01350 
01351         fs_id = nodemap_map_id(nodemap, idtype, NODEMAP_CLIENT_TO_FS,
01352                                client_id);
01353         nodemap_putref(nodemap);
01354 
01355         return fs_id;
01356 }
01357 EXPORT_SYMBOL(nodemap_test_id);
